languages.text: {n}Ульфар подходит к безрезультатно пытающемуся поднять оружие хелбруту, конечности которого содрогаются в конвульсиях. Волк достает покрытый красными рунами нож и счастливо улыбается вам.{/n} "Не опозорено имя Зловещего воя в этой битве". {n}С той же радостной улыбкой Ульфар по-хозяйски берется за забрало шлема еретика и начинает быстрыми мясницкими движениями орудовать лезвием.{/n}

{n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар подходит к безрезультатно пытающемуся поднять оружие хелбруту, конечности которого содрогаются в конвульсиях. Волк достает покрытый красными рунами нож и счастливо улыбается вам.{/n} "Не опозорено имя Зловещего воя в этой битве". {n}С той же радостной улыбкой Ульфар по-хозяйски берется за забрало шлема еретика и начинает быстрыми мясницкими движениями орудовать лезвием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the convulsing Helbrute, draws a knife covered in red runes, and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Famehungry was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same happy smile, Ulfar leans over the enemy and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the convulsing Helbrute, draws a knife covered in red runes, and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Famehungry was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same happy smile, Ulfar leans over the enemy and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the convulsing Helbrute, draws a knife covered in red runes, and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Famehungry was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same happy smile, Ulfar leans over the enemy and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}地狱兽的四肢抽搐着，徒劳地想要举起武器。乌尔法朝它走了过去，掏出一把刻满了红色符文的短刀，对你露出了笑容。{/n}“这场战斗并没有玷污‘怒嚎者’的威名。”{n}乌尔法带着同样喜悦的笑容俯下了身，一把抓住了地狱兽头盔上的面甲，以屠夫般的娴熟动作挥起了刀。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法走到了那只不断抽搐的地狱兽旁边，掏出一把刻满了红色符文的短刀，朝你笑着。{/n}“这场战斗并没有玷污‘渴名者’的威名。”{n}乌尔法带着同样开心的笑容俯下了身，以屠夫般的娴熟动作挥起了刀。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは、四肢を痙攣させながらも武器を振り上げようとするヘルブルートに歩み寄り、赤いルーンがいっぱいに刻まれたナイフを取り出すとあなたに微笑む。{/n}「破滅の咆哮の名は、この戦いで汚れちゃいない」{n}幸せそうな笑みを浮かべたまま、ウルファーは異端者のヘルメットのバイザーを掴み、シェフのような巧みさで刃を振るい始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは、四肢を痙攣させながらも武器を振り上げようとするヘルブルートに歩み寄り、赤いルーンがいっぱいに刻まれたナイフを取り出すとあなたに微笑む。{/n}「破滅の咆哮の名は、この戦いで汚れちゃいない」{n}幸せそうな笑みを浮かべたまま、ウルファーは異端者のヘルメットのバイザーを掴み、シェフのような巧みさで刃を振るい始める。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se acerca al Bruto Infernal, que aún se retuerce intentando levantar su arma, y, sonriéndote, saca un cuchillo cubierto de runas rojas.{/n} «El nombre del Aullido Torvo no ha sufrido la deshonra en esta batalla». {n}Con la misma sonrisa de felicidad, Ulfar se inclina sobre el enemigo y comienza a blandir la cuchilla con la eficacia de un carnicero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se acerca al convulso Bruto Infernal, saca un cuchillo cubierto de runas rojas y te sonríe.{/n} «El nombre de los Hambrientos de Fama no ha sufrido la deshonra en esta batalla». {n}Con la misma sonrisa de felicidad, Ulfar se inclina sobre el enemigo y comienza a blandir la cuchilla con la eficacia de un carnicero.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar s'approche du Métabrutus dont les membres agités de convulsions s'efforcent en vain de brandir son arme. Le Space Wolf dégaine un couteau couvert de runes rouges et vous sourit.{/n} « Le nom des Hurleurs sanguinaires n'a pas été terni dans ce combat. » {n}Sans se départir de son sourire extatique, il soulève nonchalamment la visière de l'hérétique et commence à le dépecer de sa lame avec toute l'efficacité d'un boucher.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar s'approche du Métabrutus agité de convulsions, tire un couteau couvert de runes rouges et vous sourit.{/n} « Le nom des Dévoreurs de gloire n'a pas été terni dans ce combat. » {n}Sans se départir de son sourire joyeux, il se penche sur l'ennemi et commence à le dépecer de sa lame avec toute l'efficacité d'un boucher.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar schreitet hinüber zu dem Höllenschlächter, dessen Glieder vergeblich zucken, vergeblich versuchen, seine Waffe zu heben. Der Wolf zieht ein Messer, das mit roten Runen bedeckt ist, und lächelt dich an.{/n} "Der Name der Baleful Howl wurde in diesem Kampf nicht entehrt." {n}Mit demselben seligen Lächeln ergreift Ulfar beiläufig den Helmvisor des Ketzers und beginnt, die Klinge mit der Effizienz eines Fleischers zu führen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar geht hinüber zu dem zuckenden Höllenschlächter, zieht ein Messer voller roter Runen und lächelt dich an.{/n} "Der Name der Famehungry wurde in dieser Schlacht nicht befleckt." {n}Mit demselben zufriedenen Lächeln beugt Ulfar sich über den Feind und führt die Klinge mit dem Geschick eines Schlachters.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, silahını çekmek için boş bir çabayla kollarını kasan Tamu Kaçkını'na doğru yürüyor. Kurt, kırmızı rünlerle kaplı bir bıçak çekip sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "Uğursuz Uluma'nın adı bu savaşta lekelenmedi." {n}Huzurlu gülümsemesini yüzünden silmeyen Ulfar, kâfirin miğferindeki vizörü tutup bıçağını bir kasap gibi kullanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar walks over to the Helbrute, whose limbs are convulsing in vain attempts to raise his weapon. The Wolf draws a knife covered in red runes and smiles at you.{/n} "The name of the Baleful Howl was not tarnished in this battle." {n}Wearing the same blissful smile, Ulfar casually grabs the visor of the heretic's helm and begins to wield the blade with the efficiency of a butcher.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, silahını çekmek için boş bir çabayla kollarını kasan Şuursuz'a doğru yürüyor. Kurt, kırmızı rünlerle kaplı bir bıçak çekip sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "Uğursuz Uluma'nın adı bu savaşta lekelenmedi." {n}Ulfar, yüzünden aynı huzurlu gülümsemeyi silmeden kâfirin miğferindeki vizörü kayıtsızca tutarak bıçağını bir kasap gibi kullanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
